TEXT.BODY: Shr profit 15 cts vs loss six cts Net profit 1,051,000 vs loss 381,000 Revs 50.8 mln vs 41.8 mln Avg shrs 7,033,00 vs 6,557,000 NOTE: 1987 net includes tax credits equal to six cts vs one cent in 1986. Reuter
